org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.activities

Class MapActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.activities.BaseActivity
                • org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.activities.BaseConsultationActivity
                  • org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.activities.MapActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class MapActivity
extends BaseConsultationActivity
    Displays a map
    • if "mediaId" StringExtra exists, centered on the media location
    • else if GPS activated, centered on the current location of the user
    • else centered on Brest
    and allows to load the closest medias of the center of the map (7 by 7)
    Author:
    Marie
